downloadTitle: Office 2010 Japanese IME addin for Windows 8
downloadDescription: This is an addin for integrated feature of Office 2010 & Windows 8 IME for Japanese.
detailsSection: Microsoft Office 2010 supports Sharepoint Dictionary and Outlook Dictionary. This addin offers the same functionality between Office 2010 and Windows 8 IME for Japanese.
systemRequirementsSection: NO specific requiremenst beyond Office 2010 and Windows 8.
installInstructionSection:
To install this download:
  1. Download the file by clicking the Download button (above) and saving the file to your hard disk.
  2. To use the 32-bit version of the files, double-click the imeaddinsetup_32bit.exe program file on your hard disk to start the Setup program.
  3. To use the 64-bit version of the files, double-click the imeaddinsetup_64bit.exe program file on your hard disk to start the Setup program.
  4. Follow the instructions on the screen to complete the installation.
